channel.title: How Would i make a Only 1 account Limit,in DIVINE www files?
channel.description:
[i]Hello! Someone know how to edit so you just can do 1 Account, Per IP?[/i]
[b] thanks,![/b] :rolleyes:

item.title: How Would i make a Only 1 account Limit,in DIVINE www files?
item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

[quote=“F BaBy, post:3, topic:231071”]$result = $db->query(‘SELECT creation_ip FROM user_credentials WHERE creation_ip = ‘’.$_SERVER[‘REMOTE_ADDR’].’’’);
$num_rows = mysql_num_rows($result);
if($num_rows >= 1)
{
$errors[] = ‘You already have the max number of accounts.’;
}

-Swag[/quote]THANKS SWAGGER!

Read full topic

item.title: How Would i make a Only 1 account Limit,in DIVINE www files?
item.dc:creator: @F_BaBy F BaBy
item.description:
@F_BaBy wrote:

	$result = $db->query('SELECT `creation_ip` FROM `user_credentials` WHERE `creation_ip` = \''.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'].'\'');
	$num_rows = mysql_num_rows($result);
	if($num_rows >= 1) 
	{
		$errors[] = 'You already have the max number of accounts.'; 
	}

-Swag
